thread.title: Aishwarya Rai, AR Rahman to perform at the ISL opening ceremony
thread.title_full: Aishwarya Rai, AR Rahman to perform at the ISL opening ceremony - The Times of India

author: Ashish Ittyerah Joseph
title: Aishwarya Rai, AR Rahman to perform at the ISL opening ceremony
text:
The frenzy about the second edition of Indian Super League is at its peak in Chennai â€” after the official launch of the Chennaiyin FC squad, and the launch of the team's training ground in the city. Now, football fans are all charged to witness the opening ceremony, and the first match of the league, which is slated to take place in the city on October 3, at Jawaharlal Nehru Stadium. While there has been secrecy about who will be performing at the opening ceremony, we learn that big names like Aishwarya Rai and AR Rahman are slated to perform.
Says a source close to the development, "The highlight of the opening ceremony will be a dance performance by former Miss World and Bollywood actress Aishwarya Rai Bachchan. There will also be other star performances and several celebs attending the grand opening." Another source close to the proceedings states, "AR Rahman, too, will be performing for the ceremony with his choir. An official announcement regarding the list of performers will be released in a few days."
